name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Vernon STEED, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Vernon STEED, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of October, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communications pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 1501(a) are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Vernon STEED, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 2, 2007.
